description:
At this event, you will get a chance to meet 15 highly innovative projects comprising medical devices for diagnosis/management of cancer, tuberculosis, ostomy, amputation and hospital infection; new therapies for neuronal regeneration, bone infection, cancer and Crohn’s Disease as well as Digital Health solutions for melanoma, fear of flying and surgery. 
Having undergone 12 months of development and maturation, these projects represent examples of research translated into highly valued global products, de-risked opportunities to investors and upcoming solutions for physicians and patients. 
A ceremony to award Innovation and Business Case will also take place, allowing networking with top level personalities and stakeholders invited to the jury panels.
name: Wrap-up RESOLVE-Health 1st & 2nd Editions
